meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>teardrop</kanji>s are also known as your <vocabulary>tears</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading with the kanji, but here's a mnemonic in case you need a refresher:

Your <kanji>teardrop</kanji>s are like little waves. What are they? They're <reading>波だ</reading> (なみだ).
